resources.string: Use a combination of lower case letters , numbers and symbols (e.g. _,@,#,$,etc.)
Are you sure you want to delete this service permanently?

Servizzion is a platform where individuals having particular skill sets can connect with business companies and fulfill their business demands.
We provide a simple , easy-to-use platform where anyone can start just in a few steps. We also charge the minimum possible commission on all fulfilled orders.
We have built this so that more and more individual sellers can use their skills for their benefits and also businesses can get their work done at a very nominal rate. We will be happy to hear from you about your experience , any suggestions regarding improvements , etc. Please feel free to write to us in the suggestion box and we will try to work on it.
Servizzion is one stop for fulfilling your small business needs and a portal where individuals can sell their skill sets in a very simple , easy to use interface.

ul.li: Easily search for services across various different fields.
Be professional while discussing your business or project ideas.
After completing the task , the seller will generate a project delivery request. Please confirm as the project gets delivered so that we can initiate payments.
Setup your account. Choose a username that describes your field of work. Provide a description of yourself for better understanding about you.
After completing a task , you have to mark the order as delivered from your pending orders list. This will send a request to the buyer for review.
We are currently working on monthly payment basis. We are working for setting our own payment systems for faster payouts. Till then we will maintain your wallets.
We charge 3% commission from buyers and 2% commission from sellers i.e. (Rs. 25 for each order of Rs. 500).

resources.string:
App Guide:
1. Search for any service that you are looking for your business. (For e.g. mobile app , web design , voice over artist , etc.)
2. A list of services offered by various sellers will be listed.
3. Click on any service and view its details.
4. You can directly message the seller for discussing about your project requirements and other details.
5. Finally , if everything goes right , place the order.
6. After completing the task given , seller will request the order delivery and you will have to confirm that the order is delivered , so that we can initiate payments.
7. For any assistance , write your query in the help section and we will respond to you.
